title: I finally got to 0 RP!
body:
BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!  Finally, after years of trying!  I got to 0 RP!  Come at me, Rioters!

Sadly, the only Rioter I know that would care is @RiotBaconhawk

replies.body: Can I have some of that ip so I can buy the runes I'm missing @-@
Welp ive gotten 0 ip before and he gave my 1 ip, the hurt feelz.
